title: Starter Winter Bundle
description: Get our Starter Bundle with our introducing products to try us out.
detailedDesc: The started bundle includes a set of Blue and Red Hats, Gloves, and Scarves made with 100% cotton to give a comfort feel for you.

title: Standard Winter Bundle
description: Get our Standard Bundle for to cover all the your needs.
detailedDesc: The Standard bundle includes a set of Blue and Red Hats, Gloves, and Scarves made with 100% wool to keep you warm for the winter.

title: Mega Winter Bundle
description: Stand out from the rest with our Mega Bundle this winter.
detailedDesc: The Mega bundle includes one set of Blue, Red, white and black Hats, Gloves, and Scarves made with 100% wool in this deluxe deal.

title: Family Winter Bundle
description: Here is our Family bundle for everyone this winter to all stay warm.
detailedDesc: The Family bundle includes two sets of Blue, Red, white and black Hats, Gloves, and Scarves made with 100% wool for everyone to enjoy.
